cohortName: [PL 192675001] Biliary cirrhosis referent concept incident cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants with >=365d prior observation
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (192675) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 192675002] Biliary cirrhosis referent concept prevalent cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (192675) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 192675003] Primary biliary cirrhosis for first time in patients history, with exclusion of secondary biliary cirrhosis
logicDescription: Primary biliary cirrhosis at first diagnosis with 365 days continuous observation, exclusion of prior secondary biliary cirrhosis. Cohort exit is the end of continuous observable time for the person.

cohortName: [PL 192675004] Primary biliary cirrhosis for first time in patients history, with second occurrence of primary biliary cirrhosis within 2 years
logicDescription: Primary biliary cirrhosis with second occurrence of within two years after with 365 days continuous observation. Cohort exit is the end of continuous observable time for the person.
